column2: an A.M. Eatery////A really cute & cool place for lunch or brunch.  The food was good & flavorful.  There were tons of people that were working
column3: but the service was still slow. Guess it's kind of expected since the place just opened so we'll see if they work out the kinks & get better over time.  The parking lot is tiny so expect to look for street parking.
